document_data.mainbody: The '''River Chionthar''' was a large river that ran through the [[Western Heartlands]]. The river started high up in the [[FarÂ Hills]] and flowed west into the [[Trackless Sea]] on the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Settlements on the river:
*[[Baldur's Gate]], which stood around the estuary of the river, granting a tidal nature to its harbor.

document_data.Trade:
Much trade flowed up and down this waterway, with barges traveling as far inland as Iriaebor.

The river's estuary in Baldur's Gate was crossed on a daily basis by many ferries and barges, particularly before its [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]] expanded and bridges were built.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-07-25 - Sewers of Baldur's Gate}}
